Articles.Content: Hello everyone, I'm new here, I wanted to take a function that is bothering me a lot, I wanted to know how to disable the tremendous screen when the ship exceeds the force G

Not sure it's what you mean but there is a setting called "Camera Wobble External". Moving the slider back to zero will stop the screen moving/vibrating around. You can access it in the general settings from the main menu or in-game through Esc->Settings.
